name: NSSharingService.CloudKitOptions
desc: Constants that describe how a participant can configure a CloudKit share.

items.name: init(rawValue: UInt)
items.desc: Creates a set of CloudKit options using the specified raw value.

items.name: static var allowPrivate: NSSharingService.CloudKitOptions
items.desc: An option that allows the participant to privately distribute the share to other iCloud users.

items.name: static var allowPublic: NSSharingService.CloudKitOptions
items.desc: An option that allows the participant to publicly distribute the share to other iCloud users.

items.name: static var allowReadOnly: NSSharingService.CloudKitOptions
items.desc: An option that allows the participant to grant other participants read-only permissions.

items.name: static var allowReadWrite: NSSharingService.CloudKitOptions
items.desc: An option that allows the participant to grant other participants read-write permissions.

items.name: static var standard: NSSharingService.CloudKitOptions
items.desc: An option that allows the participant to configure the share with a standard set of options.
